TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_A’lripay, title = A’lripay, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/A’lripay} }

S.FORM: A'lripay Itiniay i Beinan Cen no Taitung ko A'lripay a niyaro', 44 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 135 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 67% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 91 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 33% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 44 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Puyuma 49%, Amis 7%, Paiwan 2%, roma 9%.

A'lripay Itiniay i Beinan Cen no Taitong ko A'lripay a niyaro', 44 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 135 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 67% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 91 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 33% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 44 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Poyoma 49%, Amis 7%, Paiwan 2%, roma 9%.
